body.p:
Using the Configure Transformation Scenarios toolbar button, you can create a new transformation scenario of the type DITA-OT transformation and then choose one of the Markdown-specific output types:
GitHub-flavored Markdown
Markdown
GitBook
More information about the Markdown output types is available in the DITA-OT documentation: .
The generated Markdown content can be used with a static web site generator (such as MKDocs) to build a web site: .
